code: import axios from'./axiosConfig';export const getBudgets=async()=>{return await axios.get('/budgets');};export const getBudgetById=async id=>{return await axios.get("/budgets/".concat(id));};export const createBudget=async budgetData=>{return await axios.post('/budgets',budgetData);};export const updateBudget=async(id,budgetData)=>{return await axios.put("/budgets/".concat(id),budgetData);};export const deleteBudget=async id=>{return await axios.delete("/budgets/".concat(id));};
